name: Retro TV game Collection - Demo
description:
Retro TV Game collection is exactly that, four plug and play classics complete with all game settings and mechanics coded without using a modern physics engine to keep the look and feel as close to the originals as possible.

This is a demo version of the game with only the "tennis" game mode available but still has all options as well as both single player and 2 player mode. 

All feedback is welcomed and encouraged on our discord or follow our twitter for updates and announcements. 

Discord https://discord.gg/zdpzJTQPrF

Twitter @PerfectCGames

Retro TV Game Collection is releasing February 2022 on Itch.io and Steam with a mobile version coming spring 2022. 

Once downloaded please extract all contents in order to launch the game. (installer included with full version)
